response.original_title: Growing Up In A Doomsday Cult: David Berg & The Children of God
response.overview: In this eye-opening documentary, join us as we delve into the unsettling world of The Children Of God cult. Led by the charismatic David Berg, this group initially appeared as a beacon of hope during the hippie movement but hid a dark reality of manipulation and abuse.  Discover the shocking practices and deceptive tactics used by Berg to control his followers, exploiting their trust and twisting religious teachings for his own gain. Through gripping testimonies and insights, we unravel the psychological impact on individuals raised within the cult, shedding light on the importance of awareness and critical thinking in preventing manipulation.  Join us on this journey to uncover the truth behind The Children Of God, and gain valuable insights into recognizing and guarding against manipulation tactics in any setting. Whether you're a skeptic, seeker, or simply curious, this documentary offers a compelling narrative that will leave you informed and empowered.
